text: Armoire Officielle is a fashion house based out of Copenhagen, Denmark. It owns the menswear brand Armoire d'homme and the womenswear brand Armoire de femme. ==History== The company was founded as a menswear brand in 2012 by Norwegian-born designer Kjetil Aas under the name Armoire d'homme. In 2015, the company changed its name to Armoire Officielle when launching its first womenswear collection under the name Armoire de femme in 2015. The brand opened a flagship store at Lille Kanikkestræde (No. 3) in Copenhagen in 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Clothing brands Category:Clothing brands of Denmark Category:Clothing companies of Denmark Category:Clothing retailers of Denmark Category:Clothing companies based in Copenhagen Category:Danish companies established in 2012
title: Armoire Officielle
